source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH CTE1 AS (
  SELECT
    V.EQUIP_NO,
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
    V.EQUIP_DESP, 
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_DESP, 
    E.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    xls_v_Equipment_Registration V
    inner join EI_EQUIPMENT E on E.EQUIP_NO = V.EQUIP_NO
  WHERE
    (
      (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MST%'
        AND V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'EI%'
      )
      OR (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MSI%'
        AND (
          V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIX%'
          OR V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIY%'
        )
      )
    )
), CTE2 AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(W.PLAN_START_DATE) AS PLAN_START_DATE, 
    W.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    WM_WORK_ORDER W 
    left join SA_WORK_GRP S on S.WK_GRP_ID = W.WK_GRP_ID
    inner join CTE1 C1 on C1.EQUIP_ID = W.EQUIP_ID
  WHERE
    W.CREATE_DATE >= DATEADD(MONTH, -12, GETDATE())
    and S.WK_GRP_ID in (
      SELECT
        WK_GRP_ID 
      FROM 
        SA_WORK_GRP 
      WHERE 
        WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'
    )
    and W.STATUS = 'OP'
    --and W.PLAN_START_DATE >= GETDATE()
  GROUP BY
    W.EQUIP_ID
)
SELECT
  C1.*, 
  C2.PLAN_START_DATE
FROM
  CTE1 C1 
  left join CTE2 C2 on C2.EQUIP_ID = C1.EQUIP_ID
WHERE
C1.EQUIP_NO is not null
ORDER BY
  C1.EQUIP_NO

WITH CTE1 AS (
  SELECT
    V.EQUIP_NO,
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
    V.EQUIP_DESP, 
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_DESP, 
    E.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    xls_v_Equipment_Registration V
    inner join EI_EQUIPMENT E on E.EQUIP_NO = V.EQUIP_NO
  WHERE
    (
      (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MST%'
        AND V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'EI%'
      )
      OR (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MSI%'
        AND (
          V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIX%'
          OR V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIY%'
        )
      )
    )
), CTE2 AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(W.PLAN_START_DATE) AS PLAN_START_DATE, 
    W.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    WM_WORK_ORDER W 
    left join SA_WORK_GRP S on S.WK_GRP_ID = W.WK_GRP_ID
    inner join CTE1 C1 on C1.EQUIP_ID = W.EQUIP_ID
  WHERE
    W.CREATE_DATE >= DATEADD(MONTH, -12, GETDATE())
    and S.WK_GRP_ID in (
      SELECT
        WK_GRP_ID 
      FROM 
        SA_WORK_GRP 
      WHERE 
        WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'
    )
    and W.STATUS = 'OP'
    --and W.PLAN_START_DATE >= GETDATE()
  GROUP BY
    W.EQUIP_ID
)
SELECT
  C1.*, 
  C2.PLAN_START_DATE
FROM
  CTE1 C1 
  left join CTE2 C2 on C2.EQUIP_ID = C1.EQUIP_ID
WHERE
C1.EQUIP_NO is not null
ORDER BY
  C1.EQUIP_NO

SELECT d.[EQUIP_CLASS_CD]
, c.[CTX_ID1]
, c.[CTX_ID2]
, c.[CTX_ID3]
, c.[CTX_ID4]
FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET_ASSOC] a
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET] b ON b.UDF_SET_ID = a.UDF_SET_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_ASSOC] c ON c.UDF_ASSOC_ID = b.[UDF_ASSOC_ID]
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[EI_EQUIP_CLASS] d ON c.[CTX_ID1] = CAST(d.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AS CHAR)
WHERE c.GC_CTX_TYPE_CD = 'WO' AND c.CTX_ID2 <> 'C&R PROJECT WORKS' 
AND a.UDF_ID = (SELECT UDF_ID FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_DEF] WHERE UDF_NAME = 'Ref. Initial Delay (min)')
ORDER BY d.EQUIP_CLASS_CD

SELECT d.[EQUIP_CLASS_CD]
, c.[CTX_ID1]
, c.[CTX_ID2]
, c.[CTX_ID3]
, c.[CTX_ID4]
FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET_ASSOC] a
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET] b ON b.UDF_SET_ID = a.UDF_SET_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_ASSOC] c ON c.UDF_ASSOC_ID = b.[UDF_ASSOC_ID]
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[EI_EQUIP_CLASS] d ON c.[CTX_ID1] = CAST(d.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AS CHAR)
WHERE c.GC_CTX_TYPE_CD = 'WO' AND c.CTX_ID2 <> 'C&R PROJECT WORKS' 
AND a.UDF_ID = (SELECT UDF_ID FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_DEF] WHERE UDF_NAME = 'Ref. Initial Delay (min)')
ORDER BY d.EQUIP_CLASS_CD

SELECT
E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID,
E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
E1.ITEM_TYPE [TYPE],
S.CODE ,
S.DESP,
NULL as ParentCode
FROM dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2 ON E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON  E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE AND E1.ITEM_TYPE  = S.TYPE
WHERE ITEM_TYPE in ( 'IMPACT_CODE','FAILURE_SYMPTOM_CODE','FAILURE_CONSEQUENCE_CODE','FAILURE_CODE','FAILURE_CAUSE_CODE','FAILURE_ACTION_CODE','COMPONENT_CODE') and S.STATUS = 1
and E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID is not null

SELECT
E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID,
E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
E1.ITEM_TYPE [TYPE],
S.CODE ,
S.DESP,
NULL as ParentCode
FROM dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2 ON E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON  E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE AND E1.ITEM_TYPE  = S.TYPE
WHERE ITEM_TYPE in ( 'IMPACT_CODE','FAILURE_SYMPTOM_CODE','FAILURE_CONSEQUENCE_CODE','FAILURE_CODE','FAILURE_CAUSE_CODE','FAILURE_ACTION_CODE','COMPONENT_CODE') and S.STATUS = 1
and E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID is not null

SELECT 
  LINE_CD AS [Code], 
  LINE_NAME AS [Name],  
  'LINE' As [Type],
  '' ParentCode,
  '' DESP
FROM CO_LINE
  UNION
SELECT LOC_CD AS [Code], 
  LOC_NAME AS [Name],  
  'Location_DEPOT' As [Type],
  '' ParentCode,
  '' DESP
FROM
  CO_LOCATION
  where GC_LOC_TYPE_CD='DEPOT'
  UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level1' AS [Type], ''  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE WHERE CODE in ('PM', 'CM') AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE'
UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level2_PM' AS [Type], 'PM'  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in 
(SELECT GC_ID FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE CODE WHERE  CODE = 'PM' AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE')
UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level2_CM' AS [Type], 'CM'  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in 
(SELECT GC_ID FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE CODE WHERE  CODE = 'CM' AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE')

SELECT 
  LINE_CD AS [Code], 
  LINE_NAME AS [Name],  
  'LINE' As [Type],
  '' ParentCode,
  '' DESP
FROM CO_LINE
  UNION
SELECT LOC_CD AS [Code], 
  LOC_NAME AS [Name],  
  'Location_DEPOT' As [Type],
  '' ParentCode,
  '' DESP
FROM
  CO_LOCATION
  where GC_LOC_TYPE_CD='DEPOT'
  UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level1' AS [Type], ''  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE WHERE CODE in ('PM', 'CM') AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE'
UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level2_PM' AS [Type], 'PM'  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in 
(SELECT GC_ID FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE CODE WHERE  CODE = 'PM' AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE')
UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level2_CM' AS [Type], 'CM'  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in 
(SELECT GC_ID FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE CODE WHERE  CODE = 'CM' AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE')

SELECT  STD_JOB_CD, STD_JOB_DESP, WK_GRP_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL2_CD,ESTIMATE_JOB_DUR
FROM xls_v_Standard_Job
WHERE GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD='CM'

SELECT  STD_JOB_CD, STD_JOB_DESP, WK_GRP_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL2_CD,ESTIMATE_JOB_DUR
FROM xls_v_Standard_Job
WHERE GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD='CM'

SELECT DISTINCT(E3.EQUIP_NO) AS BogieNo FROM EI_EQUIP_STRT E1,EI_EQUIPMENT E2,EI_EQUIPMENT E3,EI_EQUIP_CLASS E4 WHERE E1.PARENT_EQUIP_ID = E2.EQUIP_ID AND E1.EQUIP_ID = E3.EQUIP_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E3.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'EMUYS-%' AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE '%BOGIE%'

SELECT DISTINCT(E3.EQUIP_NO) AS BogieNo FROM EI_EQUIP_STRT E1,EI_EQUIPMENT E2,EI_EQUIPMENT E3,EI_EQUIP_CLASS E4 WHERE E1.PARENT_EQUIP_ID = E2.EQUIP_ID AND E1.EQUIP_ID = E3.EQUIP_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E3.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'EMUYS-%' AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE '%BOGIE%'

select WK_GRP_ID, WK_GRP_CD from SA_WORK_GRP Where WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%' 
 or WK_GRP_CD like  'CR%'  or WK_GRP_CD like  'MO%'   order by WK_GRP_CD desc

SELECT W.WO_NO, W.WO_DESP, S.WK_GRP_ID, S.WK_GRP_CD, S.WK_GRP_NAME, W.PLAN_START_DATE, W.GC_WORK_NATURE_LV1_CD, W.GC_WORK_NATURE_LV2_CD, P.STD_JOB_CD, E1.EQUIP_NO, E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD, Isnull(C.LOC_ID,'') as LOC_ID, Isnull(C.LOC_CD,'') as LOC_CD, W.CREATE_DATE
FROM WM_WORK_ORDER W left join PM_STANDARD_JOB P on P.STD_JOB_ID = W.STD_JOB_ID left join EI_EQUIPMENT E1 on E1.EQUIP_ID = W.EQUIP_ID
left join EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2 on E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = W.EQUIP_CLASS_ID left join SA_WORK_GRP S on S.WK_GRP_ID = W.WK_GRP_ID
left join CO_LOCATION C on C.LOC_ID = W.PLAN_FROM_LOC_ID
WHERE W.CREATE_DATE >= DATEADD(DAY, -60, GETDATE()) and W.STATUS = 'OP'
and P.STD_JOB_CD is not null

SELECT DISTINCT(E3.EQUIP_NO) AS AxleNo FROM EI_EQUIP_STRT E1,EI_EQUIPMENT E2,EI_EQUIPMENT E3,EI_EQUIP_CLASS E4 WHERE E1.PARENT_EQUIP_ID = E2.EQUIP_ID AND E1.EQUIP_ID = E3.EQUIP_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E3.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'EMUYS-%' AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE '%AXLE%'
SELECT EQUIP_CLASS_CD AS CarNo FROM xls_v_Equipment_Registration WHERE EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'EMUY-SS%' ORDER BY EQUIP_NO;
SELECT EQUIP_CLASS_CD AS EquipmentNo FROM xls_v_Equipment_Registration WHERE EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'EMUYS-%' ORDER BY EQUIP_NO;

WITH CTE1 AS (
  SELECT
    V.EQUIP_NO,
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
    V.EQUIP_DESP, 
    V.EQUIP_CLASS_DESP, 
    E.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    xls_v_Equipment_Registration V
    inner join EI_EQUIPMENT E on E.EQUIP_NO = V.EQUIP_NO
  WHERE
    (
      (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MST%'
        AND V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'EI%'
      )
      OR (
        V.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'MSI%'
        AND (
          V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIX%'
          OR V.EQUIP_NO LIKE 'WIY%'
        )
      )
    )
), CTE2 AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN(W.PLAN_START_DATE) AS PLAN_START_DATE, 
    W.EQUIP_ID
  FROM
    WM_WORK_ORDER W 
    left join SA_WORK_GRP S on S.WK_GRP_ID = W.WK_GRP_ID
    inner join CTE1 C1 on C1.EQUIP_ID = W.EQUIP_ID
  WHERE
    W.CREATE_DATE >= DATEADD(MONTH, -12, GETDATE())
    and S.WK_GRP_ID in (
      SELECT
        WK_GRP_ID 
      FROM 
        SA_WORK_GRP 
      WHERE 
        WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'
    )
    and W.STATUS = 'OP'
    --and W.PLAN_START_DATE >= GETDATE()
  GROUP BY
    W.EQUIP_ID
)
SELECT
  C1.*, 
  C2.PLAN_START_DATE
FROM
  CTE1 C1 
  left join CTE2 C2 on C2.EQUIP_ID = C1.EQUIP_ID
WHERE
C1.EQUIP_NO is not null
ORDER BY
  C1.EQUIP_NO

  C1.*, 
  C2.PLAN_START_DATE
FROM
  CTE1 C1 
  left join CTE2 C2 on C2.EQUIP_ID = C1.EQUIP_ID
WHERE
C1.EQUIP_NO is not null
ORDER BY
  C1.EQUIP_NO

SELECT DISTINCT(E3.EQUIP_NO) AS BogieNo FROM EI_EQUIP_STRT E1,EI_EQUIPMENT E2,EI_EQUIPMENT E3,EI_EQUIP_CLASS E4 WHERE E1.PARENT_EQUIP_ID = E2.EQUIP_ID AND E1.EQUIP_ID = E3.EQUIP_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E3.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE 'EMUYS-%' AND E4.EQUIP_CLASS_CD LIKE '%BOGIE%'

select WK_GRP_ID, WK_GRP_CD from SA_WORK_GRP Where WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%' 
 or  WK_GRP_CD like 'CR%' order by WK_GRP_CD  desc
